description: The HooToo HT-UH002 SuperSpeed USB 3.0 Hub provides 4 additional USB 3.0 ports for your PC, allowing you to connect USB devices such as external storage, digital cameras, printers, and more. It could be bus-powered or used with a provided power adapter for high current consumption devices. Aluminum design is good for heat dissipating.Specifications:- USB Ports: 4 USB 3.0 Ports;- Power: 5V/2A Power Adapter;- Current Protection: Built-in circuit;- Transfer Rate: up to 5 Gbps - actual transmission speed varies from connected devices;- humanization design: Antiskid pads at the bottom of the hub;Operation Environment:Windows 2000/XP/Vista/7/8. Mac OS 9.1 or above (Mac Mini Excluded)*We recommend Apple users using this hub on host USB 3.0 ports for stable performancePackage Includes:- 1 * 4 port USB 3.0 hub;- 1 * USB data cable; (2.3 ft)- 1 * 5V/2A power adapter;- 1 * User Manual.;Note:- Some devices require direct connections to host USB 3.0 ports on computer, such as some hard drives, 2.4 GHz wireless keyboard or mouse adapters.- This hub is not a standalone charger; it won't charge ipad, iphone or other non-standard charging devices.We guarantee this product with 12 months warranty so if there are any problems welcome to contact Sunvalleytek for technical support or RMA process.
title: HooToo® HT-UH002 Aluminum USB 3.0 HUB 4 Ports (5V/2A Power Adapter, Better Heat Dissipation, 3.3 feet USB 3.0 Cable, Latest VIA VL812-B2 Chipset & 9081 Firmware), Backward Compatible with USB 2.0 and Supporting Windows / Mac / Linux OS
